amendment.description: To improve agricultural job opportunities, benefits, and security for aliens in the United States.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 167 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 167 proposed by Senator Kennedy for Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 118. (consideration: CR S1173) To improve agricultural job opportunities, benefits, and security for aliens in the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 167 proposed by Senator Kennedy for Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 118.
